overview: Every building has 100 stories. Kira inherits a youth hostel after her father's death. But the hostel and why she inherited it is a total mystery to her. When a previous guest shows up looking for her, she hopes some of her questions can be answered. But it would seem the beautiful and mysterious guest has an agenda of her own. Check in to this sexy mystery and check out Vivid's Hottest girl's.
title: Hollywood Hostel
